pages.text: The athame is the most sacred instrument for a witch.$(br2)It is a cerimonial blade, typically used during rituals, and is often involved in summoning rites.
An altar equipped with an athame will distribute its

energy to nearby witches, and restore their internal power more quickly.
To place the athame, right-click it on top of a formed altar.$(2br)It is also used in most sacrificial $(thing)$(t:check the proper book)rites$(), to represent the act of cutting your hand for blood, as a pawn for the life force you bring into this world.$(2br)Finally, the instrument is used to obtain some unique items

from various creatures (such as bats, horses, wolves, spiders, $(thing)$(t:even dimensional ones)smaller insects$(), ...) and an increased chance of getting their heads to drop.$(2br)Keep in mind that enchantments to increase the chance of getting resources from creatures do work with it.
